'''Monumental Study''' is a [[World Quest]] Series in [[Sumeru]].

Requirement: Start {{Quest|As the Khvarena's Light Shows}} & Picking up any [[Khvarena Inscription Fragment]].

The [[Khvarena Inscription Fragment]] can be picked first, but the player will have to Start the {{Quest|As the Khvarena's Light Shows}} for the Quest to appear.
